message: Starting content generation for weeks 1-2. Reading source materials and existing structure.

Source materials read. The existing week1.json is incorrect (contains Behavior Disorders GPC 415 instead of PSYC100). Now extracting content from source PDFs and creating proper week1.json and week2.json with enhanced questions.
Week1.json completed with 16 enhanced questions. Now creating week2.json with Theoretical Approaches content.

COMPLETED: Successfully created week1.json (What is Psychology - 16 enhanced questions) and week2.json (Theoretical Approaches - 18 enhanced questions). All questions follow enhanced format with difficulty levels, correct explanations, and detailed incorrect option explanations. Both files validated as proper JSON. Files written to study-site/src/data/weeks/. Content accurately reflects source materials from PSYC100 course PDFs.
